info.description:
some RequestForComments on compartibility

functions known to be glES300 exclusive, trying to port to older versions:
info.name: __VERSION__ compatibility3

renderpass.code:

//this has many shortcomings and issues.


//i do not dare to test bitwise operands for now.


void mainImage( out vec4 o, in vec2 u
){vec3 r=iResolution
 #if (__VERSION__ >=300)

 #endif

 ;m.xy=fra(m.xy)

 ;vec2 d=vec2(round(u.x),trunc(u.x))
 ;d.x=length(vec2(d.x,u.y)-m.xy)
 ;d.y=length(vec2(d.y,u.y)-m.xy)
 ;float a=1./Aa
 ;c=1.-(a,-a,abs(c))
 ;d=1.-(a,-a,abs(d))
 ;o.xyz=max(o.xyz,vec3(c,d))
 ;o.xyz=max(o.xyz,testEs300trig(u,r))
 ;}
renderpass.name: Image
